title: ISic001872. Funerary inscription for Mousa
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΜΟΥΣΑ
2ΧΡΗΣΤΑivy-leafΚΑΙ
3ΑΜΕΜΠΤΕ
4ΧΑΙΡΕ  ΕΖΗ
5ΣΕ  ΜΗΝΕΣ
6Ι´  ΗΜΕΡΑΣ  ΚΕ´

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy;
  • 4: Orsi: ΧΑΙΡΕ · ΕΖΗ
  • 5: lapis: ΜΗΝϹϹ

English translation

Mousa, worthy and blameless, farewell! She lived 10 months, 25 days.

commentary

The name Mousa is well attested in southern Italy, but rarely in Sicily (at Aitna, Syracusae and Tauromenium). There is no clear basis for determining the potential relationship between Kopria, Mousa and Gamike, except that it seems likely that Mousa was the child of one of the other two.

bibliography

  • Orsi 1896 400 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001709
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
